Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Maxine138
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights 7 top floor stairs decorated lovely spacious london accommodation fault breakfast choices mine english faults probably picky hand towel hair bath towel windows shut night traffic main road little noisy slept baby shut recommend staying discover london value friendly staff stay trip london

Reviews.Title: “Looks great on the surface but scratch it and it reveals big weaknesses”
Reviews.Author: franlong
Reviews.Content: booked reviews ok close olympia 2 flights stairs party bad access fit people impressions 4 wow looks amazing closer inspection looked spent lot refurb bothered day day management towels dirty smelt dried washed horrible unwashed towel smell complained understand towels laundry change beds comfortable decorated nicely bar staff pleasant 4 cant hot tap close wall wont 90 degrees 3 half tap handles fallen plug sink 2 bathroom tiny suitable larger size 12 breakfast slow 45 minutes food 6 hurry please aware chap duty thursday saturday left spent time looking sad stressed informed breakast 7 8 saturday morning 750 breakfast weekend 89 didnt tell stay fit slim time wait breakfast bring own towels

Reviews.Title: “Shabby accommodation”
Reviews.Author: sbsdrive
Reviews.Content: hotel lift third floor reception counter bathroom located smelly shabby wallpapers torn colleagues worst wall papers looked leaking walls single staying bathroom fairly clean breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Not as good as the other reviews would suggest”
Reviews.Author: QueenieBristol
Reviews.Content: chose hand flower near olympia reviews excellent near enamoured five stars definitely pub hotel obvious arrived journey found door hotel locked answering door bell eventually pub waited check people served drinks offputting offhand simple sign door useful food including breakfast served bar space light airy solo female traveller didnt feel comfortable eating dinner surrounded male drinkers screens news background music intrusive reviews warned stairs 78 counted fine remote stuck top building quirky pleasing odd shape oldfashioned furniture ached move items dressing table stuck darkness cramped eaves chair sat isolated splendour example noise flagged advance indeed tv heard traffic windows weather warm attempt boutique feel decor fashionable wallpaper colours actually shabby surprising â£95 night tap missing day light badly fitted walls scuffed etc price lower acceptable feel pretending

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: SparkleB
Reviews.Content: booked hand flower business trip budget reasonably close chelsea football ground spacious nice touches toiletries average selection beverages biscuits provided plus bottled water ear plugs didnt bathroom comfortable bed pillows rare hotels including costing lot feel welcome arrival arrived 900 pm food happy welcome journey typical pub grub menu adequate selection breakfast items helpful staff definite stay business pleasure
